DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective collection of data, aimed at a better knowledge of the context of use of Synvisc® among the patients practising a regular activity (professional/leisure), and at evaluating the different practices and their results.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Follow-up of Synvisc® in Active Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: use of Synvisc® patients practising a regular activity (professional/leisure)
